name: 劉建宏
objective: This course will introduce the fundamental knowledge and skills of software project management. It aims to develop a critical awareness of the concepts, methods, practices, and techniques for effectively managing software development process in order to deliver quality software within the time and budget constraints while satisfying the customer needs.  The course covers the subjects on project management process, project scope management, project time management, project cost management, project quality management, and project risk management techniques.
